snippet: In a bid to reshape his government, Prime Minister David Cameron shook up his cabinet on Tuesday, appointing Jeremy Hunt, who became entangled in the News Corporation scandal, to a top ministerial post.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron shuffles his cabinet in a bid to reshape his government halfway through its five-year term; reorganization is largely a cautious one, except for the promotion of Jeremy Hunt, man deeply entangled in a furor over ties between the prime minister’s inner circle and Rupert Murdoch’s scandal-tainted media empire.
lead_paragraph: In a bid to reshape his government, Prime Minister David Cameron shook up his cabinet on Tuesday, appointing Jeremy Hunt, who became entangled in the News Corporation scandal, to a top ministerial post.

headline.main: British Premier Reshuffles Cabinet, Promoting Official Linked to Murdoch Case
headline.print_headline: British Premier Reshuffles Cabinet, Promoting Official Linked to Murdoch Case
